rules.natural: Either the facility has tax-exempt status, or if it receives public funding, then either endangered species are present there or a rehabilitation program is active there.
Assuming the facility is certified ethical, then it does not have tax-exempt status.
Whenever the facility is accredited under national standards, it meets international standards.
In the event that the facility is under investigation, it is fully operational.
Either the facility is under investigation, or endangered species are present there, or a rehabilitation program is active there.
Whenever the facility's operations are restricted, it is not the case that it is fully operational.
Provided that public access to the facility is suspended, the facility's operations are restricted.
Assuming an internal audit is launched for the facility, then if there is a whistleblower report, the facility being under investigation leads to public access being suspended.
In the event that an external review is commissioned for the facility, then a whistleblower report implies that an investigation leads to suspended public access.
Provided that a board-mandated audit occurs for the facility, an internal audit is launched.
Assuming a regulator-ordered review occurs for the facility, an external review is commissioned for it.
Should a grace period be active for the facility, a compliance extension has been granted to it.
Provided that enforcement action against the facility is deferred, a grace period is active for it.
Under the condition that a financial penalty is imposed on the facility, mandatory training is ordered for it.
Either a financial penalty is imposed on the facility or a warning is issued to it.
Provided the facility passes inspection under the legislation, the financial product is compliant with financing regulations under that legislation.

If a warning is issued to the facility, then should it not be the case that (if it is not the case that (if the facility is not accredited under national standards then it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status) leads to enforcement action being deferred, then the facility's license is not revoked.

In the event that a corrective action plan exists for the facility, then if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if the facility is not accredited under national standards then it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status) leads to enforcement action being deferred, then the license is not revoked.
Provided that mandatory training is ordered for the facility, a corrective action plan exists for it.
Should an oversight hearing be scheduled for the facility, special conditions are imposed on it.
Either an oversight hearing is scheduled for the facility or routine monitoring is occurring there.
Provided that routine monitoring is occurring at the facility, then either a media inquiry happens, a public complaint exists, or it is certified ethical.
Under the condition that an amendment to the legislation is proposed, new regulations under the legislation are implemented.

Either an amendment to the legislation is proposed, or if special conditions are imposed on the facility, then either a media inquiry occurs, a public complaint exists, or the facility is certified ethical.
Provided that the financial product is compliant with financing regulations under the legislation, it is eligible for a grant for the facility.
If the grant application for the financial product for the facility is rejected, funding from that financial product for the facility is suspended.
Provided that there is a donor withdrawal from the financial product for the facility, the grant application for that financial product for the facility is rejected.
Under the condition that there is a capital freeze on the financial product for the facility, there is a donor withdrawal from that financial product for the facility.
Should endangered species be present at the facility, it qualifies for a subsidy.
Provided that a rehabilitation program is active at the facility, it qualifies for a subsidy.
Assuming it is not the case that either a board-mandated audit or a regulator-ordered review occurs for the facility, then a voluntary review occurs for it.
Provided that it is not the case that either a board-mandated audit or a regulator-ordered review occurs for the facility, a voluntary review does not occur for it.
Provided that it is not the case that the facility meeting international standards implies it is certified ethical, there is a capital freeze on the financial product for the facility.

If it is not the case that the financial product being eligible for a grant for the facility implies the facility does not violate animal welfare standards, then the facility has conditional approval.

Assuming it is not the case that the financial product being eligible for a grant for the facility implies the facility does not violate animal welfare standards, the facility does not have conditional approval.

In the event that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that the facility being accredited under national standards implies it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status, there is a threat of suspension against the facility.

If it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that the facility being accredited under national standards implies it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status) leads to enforcement action being deferred, then the license of the facility is revoked.
In the event that it is not the case that (if the facility does not qualify for a subsidy then it is not approved for the financial product), the facility violates animal welfare standards.

Under the condition that it is not the case that (if the facility does not qualify for a subsidy then it is not approved for the financial product), the facility passes inspection under the legislation.
Should the facility not qualify for a subsidy, it is approved for the financial product.

(¬(¬(¬(A12 → A11) → A13) → A27) → A28).natural: If it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that the facility being accredited under national standards implies it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status) leads to enforcement action being deferred, then the license of the facility is revoked.

(¬(¬(¬(A12 → A11) → A13) → A27) → ¬A28).natural: Provided that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that the facility being accredited under national standards implies it is certified ethical) then it has provisional status) leads to enforcement action being deferred, the facility's license is not revoked.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → A2).natural: In the event that it is not the case that (if the facility does not qualify for a subsidy then it is not approved for the financial product), the facility violates animal welfare standards.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → A3).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that (if the facility does not qualify for a subsidy then it is not approved for the financial product), the facility passes inspection under the legislation.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → ¬A2).natural: Assuming it is not the case that (if the facility does not qualify for a subsidy then it is not approved for the financial product), the facility does not violate animal welfare standards.

(¬G → A1).natural: Should the facility not qualify for a subsidy, it is approved for the financial product.

(¬G → ¬A1).natural: Provided the facility does not qualify for a subsidy, it is not approved for the financial product.

A11.natural: The facility is certified as ethical.

A12.natural: The facility is accredited under national standards.

A19.natural: There is a whistleblower report regarding the facility.

G.natural: The facility qualifies for a subsidy.

¬A10.natural: It is not the case that the facility has tax-exempt status.

¬A13.natural: The facility does not have provisional status.

¬A14.natural: There is not a threat of suspension against the facility.

¬A15.natural: The facility is not under investigation.

¬A25.natural: A compliance extension has not been granted to the facility.

¬A33.natural: There is not a public complaint about the facility.

¬A34.natural: There is not a media inquiry about the facility.

¬A38.natural: An amendment to the legislation is not proposed.

¬A39.natural: New regulations under the legislation are not implemented.

¬A41.natural: Funding from the financial product for the facility is not suspended.
